news.markdown: **WINDOW** --- _“It’s okay, I’m dealing with it”_ has been chosen for the [WINDOW Arts Industry showcase](http://www.bn1magazine.co.uk/brighton-fringe-reveals-2016-programme/) as part of Brighton Fringe 2016. The WINDOW Programme is made up of ten shows selected by arts industry experts for the quality of their work.
news.html: WINDOW — “It’s okay, I’m dealing with it” has been chosen for the WINDOW Arts Industry showcase as part of Brighton Fringe 2016. The WINDOW Programme is made up of ten shows selected by arts industry experts for the quality of their work.

events.markdown:
_**May-We-Go-Round?**_
**19 May** --- Guildhall Arts Centre, Grantham
**2 June** --- Pulse Festival at New Wolsey Theatre, Ipswich --- **[Tickets](https://www.wolseytheatre.co.uk/shows/pulse16-may-we-go-round/)**
**7 -- 8 June** --- Camden People's Theatre, London --- **[Tickets](https://www.cptheatre.co.uk/production/may-go-round/)**
**18 June** --- Old Town Hall, Hemel Hempstead --- **[Tickets](https://toth.dacorum.gov.uk/dance)**
